verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> were <S%H8552>clean<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> you <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> out of every tribe a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And <S%H6680>command<s%> ye them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5375>Take<s%> you <S%H4480>hence<s%> <S%H2088><s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H4673><s%> where the <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> stood <S%H3559>firm,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and ye shall carry them <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, and <S%H5117>leave<s%> them in the lodging <S%H4411>place,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> ye shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> this <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of every tribe a <S%H376>man:<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7626><s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and take ye <S%H7311>up<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> of you <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, that <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> their fathers in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean ye by <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones?<s%>

Then ye shall <S%H559>answer<s%> them, <S%H834>That<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> when it passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were cut <S%H3772>off:<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and carried them <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the place where they <S%H4411>lodged,<s%> and laid them <S%H5117>down<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> where the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H4673>stood:<s%> and they <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> was <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H8552>clean<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them:

About <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>prepared<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

On <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> him, <S%H834>as<s%> they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that they come <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Come ye <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> were come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> were lifted <S%H5423>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the dry <S%H2724>land,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H1980>flowed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1415>banks,<s%> <S%H8543>as<s%> they did <S%H8032>before.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> in the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>pitch<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H834>When<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones?<s%>

Then ye shall <S%H853>let<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on dry <S%H3004>land.<s%>

For <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> ye were passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us, <S%H5704>until<s%> we were gone over: <S%H5674><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H2389>mighty:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye might <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
